SELECT wsm.station_name as stationName, wsm.station_code as stationCode, wsm.sort_code as sortCode, duct.product_name as productName, duct.product_no as productNo, dwsp.work_station_product_id as workStationProductId FROM `dz_working_station_product` AS dwsp LEFT JOIN dz_work_station_management AS wsm ON dwsp.working_station_id = wsm.station_id LEFT JOIN dz_product AS duct ON dwsp.product_id = duct.product_id WHERE dwsp.working_station_id = #{workingStationId}
AND duct.product_no = #{productNo}
